quotes.quote: Every day is a good day to be alive, whether the sun's shining or not.
If you don't think every day is a good day, just try missing one.
I hope everyone that is reading this is having a really good day. And if you are not, just know that in every new minute that passes you have an opportunity to change that.
Every day is a good day, some are just a little better than others.
On a bad day, I have mood swings - but on a good day, I have the whole mood playground.
You can't live a perfect day without doing something for someone who will never be able to repay you.
Whenever I don't' have to wear makeup, it's a good day.
Every single day is a good day no matter how bright or dark it is, because it always brings an opportunity to start a positive beginning in your life.
No matter, how is the start of the day, but end should be always good in the end of the day.
This is a wonderful day, I have never seen this one before.
The good old days are now.
Every day above earth is a good day.
We know nothing of tomorrow; our business is to be good and happy today.
Joyful morning, good morning, good day.
Today is a Happy Day because I say it is.
From the moment I woke up, I could tell that it was going to be a good day.
Every day is a good day when you run.
Every day above ground is a good day.
A day will be good, when you do for someone good.
Everyone has highs and lows that they have to learn from, but every morning I start off with a good head on my shoulders, saying to myself,  It's going to be a good day!'.
Some days are just bad days, that's all. You have to experience sadness to know happiness, and I remind myself that not every day is going to be a good day, that's just the way it is!
Good days, they come around the oddest corners.
Good news equals good day.
I wake up every day and I think,  I'm breathing! It's a good day.'
Find peace in the morning rush and you will have a good day.
You have good days, you have bad days. But the main thing is to grow mentally.
A good day is a good day. A bad day is a good story.
Every day is a good day. Your every-day mind - that is the Way!
When you're having a bad day at work, a lot of times it's your head. When you're having good days, a lot of times it's the absence of the mind.
A well-spent day brings happy sleep.
Leave something good in every day.

Good days are to be gathered like grapes, to be trodden and bottled into wine and kept for age to sip at ease beside the fire. If the traveler has vintaged well, he need trouble to wander no longer; the ruby moments glow in his glass at will.
Because when you stop and look around, this life is pretty amazing.
Hope can come from having a good day.
If you want to be happy, you have to be happy on purpose. When you wake up, you just can't wait to see what kind of day you'll have. You have to decide what kind of day you'll have.
If we'd only stop trying to be happy, we could have a pretty good time.
It's a good day to have a good day.
Consider that this day  never dawn again.
A bad day is still a good day when we take actions, no matter how small, to live with joy. Then our good days don't happen by chance, they happen by design.
If we are in a good mood when we get up in the morning, if there is a warm-hearted feeling within, automatically our inner door is opened for that day.
Just as a  good day's work leads to pleasant sleep, so a life well-spent leads to a pleasant death.
A rainy morn oft brings a pleasant day.
Live today. Forget the  cares of the past
Today means boundless and inexhaustible eternity. Months and years and all periods of time are concepts of men, who gauge everything by number but the true name of eternity is today.
Seize the day and put the least possible trust in tomorrow.

Look to this day / For it is life, the very life of life / For yesterday is but a dream / And tomorrow is only a vision / But today well lived makes every yesterday a dream of happiness / And tomorrow a vision of hope /  Look well, therefore, to this day.
If useless thoughts do not / Cloud your mind / Each day is the best of your life
Nothing is worth more than this day.
This time, like all times, is a very good one, if we know what to do with it.

Make the most of today. Translate your good intentions into actual deeds. Today is the day in which to express your noblest qualities of mind and heart, to do at least one worthy thing which you have long postponed.
A wish is that / Have a good time / Have a good life / A wish from the heart / Not from the mind.
Just wanted to pop in and wish you a good morning / Have a good day let's write a brand new story / Everyday different place brand new territory / Living like me it never gets boring.
Every day is a good day. There is something to learn, care and celebrate.
At the end of the day, if I can say I had fun, it was a good day.
Anyone can have a good day, but you have to be able to perform on a bad day.
Every day should be a good day. People fool themselves that they'll be here forever.
Every day that I wake up has to be a good day!
I wake up every morning thinking…this is my last day. And I jam everything into it. There’s no time for mediocrity. This is no damned dress rehearsal.
Give every day the chance to become the most beautiful day of your life.
Each day is a little life: every waking and rising a little birth, every fresh morning a little youth, every going to rest and sleep a little death.
I get up every morning and it’s going to be a great day. You never know when it’s going to be over so I refuse to have a bad day.
Let today be the day you give up who you’ve been for who you can become.
